structure.unit: Officers And Inmates Of Penal And Reformatory Institutions. Paroles And Pardons

law.catch_line: General Education Development Tests; Age Requirement; No Fee
law.text: The department of education shall permit an inmate of a correctional institution of the commonwealth who is eighteen years of age or over to take the general education development tests, and said department shall not charge an application or testing fee to any inmate desiring to take said tests.
